Text: RE Sales to TXU for April Cc can you also add Karen Herrmann to the distribution She handles most of the daytoday accounting thanks Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Monday April AM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Vos Theresa Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Opps Would help if I included Theresa Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Monday April AM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Sold dth of Conger gas to TXU for at that wraps up the sales for April Theresa Ive attached my worksheet showing how much we sold TXU for April and what price The daily volumes are in column M and the daily prices are in column N We should bill TXU for dth and a dollar amount of Call me if you have any questions Thanks File MARGASxls Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Friday April PM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Sold dth of Conger gas to TXU for at Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Thursday April AM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Sold dth of Conger gas to TXU for at Also received a call from Jeff at Lone Star telling us to work a little harder at working off the imbalance Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Wednesday April PM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Sold dth of Conger gas to TXU for at Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday April AM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Sales to TXU for April We sold dth of the Conger gas to TXU for at Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Monday April PM To Germany Chris Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Vos Theresa McMichael Jr Ed Subject RE Sales to TXU for April OK Kathy and Troy have pointed out how bad my previous email was Im sure I was thinking about lunch Sabra Dinari scheduled the gas on Lone Start She quit on Friday I will be doing the scheduling until further notice Kathy Kelly will be my backup when Im out Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Monday April AM To Kelly Katherine L Mazowita Mike Greif Donna Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Vos Theresa McMichael Jr Ed Subject RE Sales to TXU for April Sold dth of Conger to TXU for at Our scheduler Sabra Dinari quit on Friday so I will be handling the noms for awhile and Kathy Kelly will I think its easier for me to do the noms on this since Im selling point specific gas and we are not putting this activity in SitarUnify Theresa looks like I will be the one addressing the accounting questions Original Message From Kelly Katherine L Sent Friday April AM To Germany Chris Mazowita Mike Dinari Sabra L Denetsosie Troy Subject Sales to TXU for April Ive sold TXU dth at for Sat through Mon Sabra I sold them of Conger gas Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Thursday April AM To Germany Chris Mazowita Mike Kelly Katherine L Dinari Sabra L Denetsosie Troy Cc Hill Garrick Subject RE Lone Star Sales to TXU for April Sold TXU dth at for Fri Sabra I sold them of Conger gas and of the Sprayberry Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Wednesday April AM To Germany Chris Mazowita Mike Kelly Katherine L Dinari Sabra L Cc Hill Garrick Subject Lone Star Sales to TXU for April Sold TXU dth at for Thur I checked on the price with Darren Farmer at AEP and he said thats where Waha was trading so I dont feel like we are being taken advantage of too much Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday April AM To Mazowita Mike Kelly Katherine L Dinari Sabra L Cc Germany Chris Hill Garrick Subject Lone Star sales for Wed Sold TXU dth at for Wednesday

RE Westinghouse Settlement Cc still waiting for a copy of the signed agreement I will process the wire as soon as I receive this My fax is theresa Original Message From Robinson Mitch Sent Tuesday March PM To Vos Theresa Cc Miller Don Subject Re Westinghouse Settlement Theresa Have we wired the money to SWPC Theyve been calling Thanks Mitch Forwarded by Mitch RobinsonCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Mitch Robinson AM To Theresa nronXgate cc Kay nron Jody nronXgate Subject Re Westinghouse Settlement OLE Object StdOleLink Executed Should have let you know Yes please process Kay if you have a signed version of the agreement you may want to forward a copy to Theresa Thanks Mitch From Theresa nronXgate on AM To Kay nron Mitch nron cc Jody nronXgate Subject Westinghouse Settlement Any news on when the Westinghouse Settlement Agreement will be executed I am responsible for processing the payment from the peakers once it is signed thanks theresa x

RE Westinghouse Settlement Cc still waiting for a copy of the signed agreement I will process the wire as soon as I receive this My fax is theresa Original Message From Robinson Mitch Sent Tuesday March PM To Vos Theresa Cc Miller Don Subject Re Westinghouse Settlement Theresa Have we wired the money to SWPC Theyve been calling Thanks Mitch Forwarded by Mitch RobinsonCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Mitch Robinson AM To Theresa nronXgate cc Kay nron Jody nronXgate Subject Re Westinghouse Settlement OLE Object StdOleLink Executed Should have let you know Yes please process Kay if you have a signed version of the agreement you may want to forward a copy to Theresa Thanks Mitch From Theresa nronXgate on AM To Kay nron Mitch nron cc Jody nronXgate Subject Westinghouse Settlement Any news on when the Westinghouse Settlement Agreement will be executed I am responsible for processing the payment from the peakers once it is signed thanks theresa x

RE Northwestern Cc PaulNera please hold the wire for Montana Megawatts I LLC for that was scheduled for pmt today I will let you know when it is ok to release it thanks theresa Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Monday November AM To Booth Chris Vos Theresa Jacoby Ben Subject Northwestern By my calculation this payment is not due today I have advised Northwesterns attorney of this fact Dave Duran wants to be advised prior to this money being sent Thanks Kay

RE MiscThe additional income for Northwestern will be booked by the end of this week This isnt supposed to be split with Calger is it Kay all legal invoices for Delta should be split Ben Jacoby cc Chris Calger cc Original Message From Jacoby Ben Sent Tuesday November PM To Vos Theresa Subject Misc Theresa I wanted to follow up on a couple minor items Have you booked the discount associated with the Northwestern deal as income On the Delta Power LM deal I believe the legal invoices should be split according to the income allocation I think the split was million to Calger and million to me Thanks Ben

RE Williams invoices for Tenaska Cc I believe James contact at Williams is Shelly OBrian We will try and get the wire out today but that depends on Rick signing it and the bank cooperating There was a misunderstanding that the MM needed to be paid regardless of if the November payment was made or not Karen please prepare the funding request for today thanks theresa Original Message From Hill Garrick Sent Thursday March AM To Herrmann Karen Vos Theresa Cc Mazowita Mike Dhont Margaret Parks Joe Subject RE Williams invoices for Tenaska Good news on the November payment However we still need to execute the wire for to prepay April supply costs inasmuch as the issue here relates more to our inability to get an LC in place prior to the end of this month Were working on the LC matter with JP Morgan and will have it resolved in April In the meantime weve agreed to make the prepayment prior to Williams accepting April nominations due yesterday per Joe Parks Mike needs to follow through with Williams on the November payment based on our findings Any idea who James may have spoke with at Williams It would be helpful to Mike to have this information when he calls the credit analyst that brought the issue to his attention Also in response to Margarets comment below I think James made the December payment to Williams directly as a result of the Lone Star problem and our own cash management issues Thanks RH Original Message From Herrmann Karen Sent Wednesday March PM To Hill Garrick Mazowita Mike Cc Vos Theresa Subject FW Williams invoices for Tenaska Please see the attached spreadsheet showing payments for Williams We are getting more detail on these payments ie dates Fed reference numbers but you can see that Enron has pretty much paid all the invoices for Tenaska Theresa spoke with James on this matter and he said he spoke with Apache and Williams when the snafu with Lone Star was realized and both said that Tenaska was paid up to date This being the situation we did not prepare a funding request for the prepayment to Williams for April Margaret is working on getting the payment info for Apache I expect to have it soon Thanks Karen Original Message From Dhont Margaret Sent Wednesday March PM To Herrmann Karen Subject RE Williams invoices for Tenaska File Payments to ENATenaska IVxls Karen I have added columns for the actual amount of the supply verification that I have the amount of the payment that was sent and the date the payment was sent I cant see what happened in December either I cant even find a file for December I will go ahead and check the Apache payments now Margaret Original Message From Herrmann Karen Sent Wednesday March AM To Dhont Margaret Subject Williams invoices for Tenaska Margaret attached is a spreadsheet that shows the payments Tenaska IV made to ENA the Williams and Apaches invoice amounts and numbers that should have been paid I dont have statement numbers for all the Williams invoices but I put the contract number on there For the payment that Tenaska made to ENA in January Im not sure how much went to Williams and how much went to Apache The invoices for those vendors for that month total to more than the money that Tenaska sent to Enron So whatever you can find out will be helpful If you would look into the Williams stuff first and let us know what you find as quickly as possible we would appreciate it If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks a bunch Karen x File Payments to ENAxls

RE New Albany Loss Cc PST yes this was a nonDPR flash item Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Monday October AM To Vos Theresa Subject RE New Albany Loss Where did she get this information Is it a below the line adjustment not in the DPR Stacey Original Message From Vos Theresa Sent Monday October AM To Pierce Jody White Stacey W Cc Hardy Trey Helton Susan Miller Don Asset Mktg Subject RE New Albany Loss Per Louise the MM loss on sale was flashed and booked to Presto Original Message From Hardy Trey Sent Monday October AM To Vos Theresa Subject RE New Albany Loss That is Prestos Original Message From Vos Theresa Sent Monday October AM To Hardy Trey Subject RE New Albany Loss Original Message From Hardy Trey Sent Monday October AM To Vos Theresa Subject RE New Albany Loss What PC did you hit Original Message From Vos Theresa Sent Monday October AM To Hardy Trey Cc Pierce Jody Subject RE New Albany Loss Trey Where did the MM New Albany loss end up I booked it to the management summary pc that you gave me but I didnt know if it got reclassed to Presto or not thanks Original Message From Pierce Jody Sent Monday October AM To Vos Theresa Subject FW New Albany Loss Theresa Can you find out where the loss was booked Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Monday October AM To Pierce Jody Subject RE New Albany Loss What is the latest on this Stacey Original Message From Pierce Jody Sent Friday October AM To White Stacey W Cc Vos Theresa Subject New Albany Loss Stacey Georganne mentioned that you thought we may have booked a reserve for this back when you were unwinding the deals We did not Do we need to get together to discuss this Jody
